item.title: Scania S 500 qualified 1.52 ETS2
item.description:
Scania S 500 qualified 1.52 ETS2

5 cabins: StreamSpace 2,50, BigSpace , GigaSpace, Edition1, Edition 2
– 15 chassis variants: 11 chassis tractor
– 7 engine variants OM 471 / OM 471 – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 gearbox variants – Mercedes drivetrain mod ready
– 6 Interior variants LHD + RHD: Basic, Style Line, Trend Line, Edition 1, Edition 2



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: G7 BioSafe SC 6×2 1.52 ETS2
item.description:
G7 BioSafe SC 6×2 1.52 ETS2

Mod Information.
LIGHTER MOD. Comes with installation file.
6 Different Scania steering wheel options.
3 6×2 chassis options: Mod plate or Original ETS 2 plate.
2 Improved engine sounds and physics.
Automatic or Manual transmission options.
103 Company skins to choose from and 10 for you to edit your way.
Instructions for you to edit.
White cabin light. (Tip: Letter O turns on the light)
Optional internal rearview mirror.
Optional exhaust.
Realistic shadows.
Several license plates to choose from: Euro, Mercosul and National.
Functional pedals with animations: Brake and accelerator.
Windshield wiper. 3 speeds.
Dashboard with functional animations.
Animations on doors and windows.

Optional 3D Passengers inside the Bus.
Passengers remain seated when boarding, and when disembarking they leave the Bus.
There will soon be animations in the luggage compartments.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
